main event: A greenish-white object was observed from Yuma, Arizona moving northwest and was visible for several seconds before it appeared to explode into pieces.
interesting points: The pilot initially thought the object was a meteorite but later concluded it was larger and at a lower altitude., A United Airlines pilot reported bright lights trailing sparks and flames that illuminated the cockpit., The object was seen by Yuma Proving Grounds at El Mirage Field, who also reported bright lights., The sighting involved multiple witnesses including military and civilian pilots., The incident was investigated by various military branches with no accounts of missile activity.
witness description: a United Airlines pilot and military personnel at Yuma Proving Grounds
